overview:
The digital world around us is changing rapidly. Are you looking for help to your business, product or service to the attention on the internet? Wonder Infotech is already more than five years in the digital domain. We advise you in all your digital media issues.

Method:

  1. Proposal Identify your problem followed with a proposal. Following an initial exploratory meeting, we propose to you. This proposal is a statement of the costs and an explanation of how we think a successful way to carry out your project.

  2. Concept The concept is the translation of your identity and goals to the Internet. In a way that speaks to your target audience. We devise a concept for your internet problem and create the basis for a web design. This will be during a presentation by our concept explained and discussed with you. Obviously still changes are implemented. Only when you are happy we begin the next phase.

  3. Technical Implementation Technology is at the service of the goals of your website. Our web designers and programmers work according to the latest technical standard. The result for you in a website interactive, user-friendly, attractive and well indexed on search engines.

With every project we considering the technique we can best work to achieve the goal. Of course we also involve cost considerations into account.

Commonly used techniques in Wonder Infotech are HTML, AJAX, PHP, Flash and XML.

  1. Online Marketing

If your website is launched then start the game only. Because of course you want your audience to be able to find your website. Online marketing is the umbrella term for all resources for getting more visitors to your web site and these visitors into customers know it. We work closely with a specialist partner so that we can offer you the best solution.

  1. Content Management

Wonder Infotech has his own Content Management System designed to not depend on any restrictions that standard systems entail. And you reap the benefits of you receive a maintenance system that is not only very user friendly but also very flexible in application. Any desired additional function in your website we can at relatively low cost to add your website and CMS.\
